name: Ocellaris Clownfish
description: The Ocellaris Clownfish, also known as the False Percula Clownfish or Clown Anemonefish, is one of the most popular and recognizable marine fish species. It is known for its vibrant orange coloration with white stripes.

name: Maroon Clownfish
description: The Maroon Clownfish, also known as the Spine-Cheeked Anemonefish, is a striking fish species with bold red or maroon coloration. It is known for its aggressive behavior and should be housed with caution.

name: Tomato Clownfish
description: The Tomato Clownfish, also known as the Bridled Clownfish or Red Clownfish, is a bold and colorful marine fish species. It is characterized by its vibrant orange-red coloration and three distinctive white stripes.

name: Picasso Clownfish
description: The Picasso Clownfish, also known as the Black Ice Clownfish, is a unique and visually striking marine fish species. It is known for its distinctive black and white coloration, resembling the patterns of a Picasso painting.

name: True Percula Clownfish
description: The True Percula Clownfish, also known as the Clown Anemonefish, is a vibrant and popular marine fish species. It is known for its bright orange coloration with three distinctive white stripes.

name: Clarkii Clownfish
description: The Clarkii Clownfish, also known as the Yellowtail Clownfish, is a colorful and hardy marine fish species. It is known for its striking coloration, which includes bright orange bodies with white stripes and yellow tails.

name: Cinnamon Clownfish
description: The Cinnamon Clownfish is a lesser-known but beautiful marine fish species. It is characterized by its warm cinnamon coloration and is often found in reef environments.

name: Skunk Clownfish
description: The Skunk Clownfish, also known as the Pink Skunk Clownfish, is a charming and peaceful marine fish species. It is characterized by its pink-orange coloration with a prominent white stripe running from its head to its tail.

name: Mcculochi Clownfish
description: The Mcculochi Clownfish, also known as the Red Clownfish or Tomato Anemonefish, is a beautiful and vibrant marine fish species. It is characterized by its bright red coloration with white stripes.

name: Sebae Clownfish
description: The Sebae Clownfish, also known as the Saddleback Clownfish, is a distinctive and hardy marine fish species. It is characterized by its bright orange coloration with a single white stripe and a dark saddle-like marking on its back.

name: Oman Clownfish
description: The Oman Clownfish is a lesser-known but attractive marine fish species. It is characterized by its bright orange coloration with white stripes and is found in the waters around Oman.
